content: Looking back at the first half of this year, where have you seen God's faithfulness most clearly?
What's one way you've grown in your faith this year that surprises you?
What dreams or hopes did you start the year with? How have they evolved?
If you could thank God for one specific thing from the past six months, what would it be?
What area of your life feels most in need of God's healing or restoration right now?
What habit or practice has helped you feel closest to God this year?
What is God inviting you to step into or pursue in the next six months?
What's one practical goal you'd like to set for your spiritual growth?
If fear wasn't a factor, what would you ask God to help you accomplish this year?
Who in your life could you invest in or serve more intentionally?
What do you sense God wanting to prune away from your life to make room for new growth?
What are you most excited to see God do in the remainder of this year?
Where have you experienced God's grace covering your mistakes or shortcomings?
What Scripture or truth about God has been particularly meaningful to you recently?
How do you want to be different by the end of this year? What would that look like?
What's one way you'd like to love others better in the coming months?
